languages.text: "Лжецы вроде вас недостойны носить звание друзей династии". {n}Абеляр тянется к оружию.{/n} "Впрочем, вам никто и не предлагал подобной чести".
"Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has extended such an honour to you."
languages.original_text: "Лжецы вроде вас недостойны носить звание друзей династии". {n}Абеляр тянется к оружию.{/n} "Впрочем, вам никто и не предлагал подобной чести".

traits.locale_text: "Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty" {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has offered you such an honour."
"Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty" {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has offered you such an honour."
"Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has offered you such an honour."
"Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has offered you such an honour."
"Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has extended such an honour to you."
"Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has extended such an honour to you."

languages.text: "Lügner wie Ihr verdienen es nicht, sich Freunde der Dynastie zu nennen." {n}Abelard greift nach seiner Waffe.{/n} "Abgesehen davon, dass Euch diese Ehre gar nicht angeboten wurde."
languages.original_text: "Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has extended such an honour to you."

traits.locale_text: "Lügner wie Ihr verdienen es nicht, sich Freunde der Dynastie zu nennen." {n}Abelard greift nach seiner Waffe.{/n} "Abgesehen davon, dass Euch diese Ehre gar nicht angeboten wurde."

languages.text: « Les menteurs comme vous ne méritent pas l'appellation d'amis de la dynastie. » {n}Abélard tend la main vers son arme.{/n} « Mais je ne pense pas qu'on vous ait proposé cet honneur. »
languages.original_text: "Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has extended such an honour to you."

traits.locale_text: « Les menteurs comme vous ne méritent pas l'appellation d'amis de la dynastie. » {n}Abélard tend la main vers son arme.{/n} « Mais je ne pense pas qu'on vous ait proposé cet honneur. »

languages.text: “像你这样的骗子，根本不配自称冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的朋友。”{n}阿贝拉德将手伸向了武器。{/n}“没人赐予过你这样的荣耀。”
languages.original_text: "Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has extended such an honour to you."

traits.locale_text: “像你这样的骗子，根本不配自称冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的朋友。”{n}阿贝拉德将手伸向了武器。{/n}“没人给过你这样的荣耀。”

languages.text: 「あなたのような嘘つきには王朝の友と名乗る資格などありませんよ」{n}アベラルドは武器に手を伸ばす。{/n}「そもそも誰もあなたにそのような特権は与えてはいない」
languages.original_text: "Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has extended such an honour to you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなた方のような嘘つきは、自身を王朝の友と名乗るにふさわしくない」{n}アベラルドは武器に手を伸ばす。{/n}「誰もあなた方にそのような名誉は与えてはいない」
「あなたのような嘘つきには王朝の友と名乗る資格などありませんよ」{n}アベラルドは武器に手を伸ばす。{/n}「そもそも誰もあなたにそのような特権は与えてはいない」

languages.text: «La gente que miente como usted no merece forjar una amistad con la dinastía». {n}Abelard lleva la mano a su arma.{/n} «Y tampoco es que le hayan brindado tal honor».
languages.original_text: "Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has extended such an honour to you."

traits.locale_text: «La gente que miente como usted no merece forjar una amistad con la dinastía». {n}Abelard lleva la mano a su arma.{/n} «Tampoco es que le hayan brindado tal honor».

languages.text: "Hanedanlığımızı dost edinmek, sizin gibi yalancıların haddine değildir efendim." {n}Abelard, silahına uzanıyor.{/n} "Hoş, böyle bir şerefi bahşeden de olmadı."
languages.original_text: "Liars like you, sir, do not deserve to call themselves friends of the dynasty." {n}Abelard reaches for his weapon.{/n} "Not that anyone has extended such an honour to you."

traits.locale_text: "Hanedanlığımızı dost edinmek, sizin gibi yalancıların haddine değildir efendim." {n}Abelard, silahına uzanıyor.{/n} "Hoş, böyle bir şerefi bahşeden de olmadı."
